thread.section_title: Hotel Bradford Elysees - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Experience!
thread.title_full: Excellent Experience! - Review of Hotel Bradford Elysees - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Ginett V
title: Excellent Experience!
text:
I go to Paris 2-4 times a year for business and always stay at the Bradford hotel.
The service provided by the staff always makes my 2-week stay feel like home!
The staff is friendly and the breakfast set up is delicious. Laurent is always there to greet you with a warm hello!
I suggest staying in rooms from the 3rd floor and up. You can hear the street noise from the bottom 2 floors during rowdy weekend nights.
